# nios_grid_memberdfp (Resource)

Manages a Memberdfp resource object.

## Example Usage

```terraform
// Create an Member dfp attribute definition with Basic Fields
resource "nios_grid_memberdfp" "memberdfp__with_basic_fields" {
  host_name       = "infoblox.member1"
  is_dfp_override = true
}

//Create an Member dfp attribute definition with additional fields
resource "nios_grid_memberdfp" "memberdfp__with_basic_fields" {
  host_name         = "infoblox.member1"
  is_dfp_override   = true
  dfp_forward_first = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `dfp_forward_first` (Boolean) Option to resolve DNS query if resolution over Active Trust Cloud failed.
- `host_name` (String) Host name of the parent Member
- `is_dfp_override` (Boolean) DFP override lock'.

### Read-Only

- `ref` (String) The reference to the object.
